# Panasonic 6 Axis Articulated Arc Welding Robot
## Ideas for Life - TATB Series

### All New GH Controller!
- Digital interface with "Full Digital" welding machine
- Achieving advanced weld performance

#### Model Information
- **TA-140pq1**
- **TB-1400G1**

### Overview
Panasonic pursues advanced welding technology with the TATB Series, featuring the latest in robotic welding solutions. The integration of the GH controller enhances the welding process, ensuring precision and efficiency.

# TA/TB Series Digital Interfacing with Panasonic "Full Digital" GH Welding Machine

## Achieving Stable and Advanced Quality Welding Results

### High Performance Manipulator Optimized for Arc Welding

#### Models Overview
- **TA Series:**
- TA-1000
- TA-1400
- TA-1600
- TA-1800
- TA-1900

- **TB Series:**
- TB-1400
- TB-1800

### Features

#### Integrated Torch Cable
- **Description:** The integrated type creates less interference and improves accessibility.
- **Benefits:**
- Improved accessibility
- Less interference with work piece or jig

#### Robust Arm with Compact Wrist Design
- **TB-1400 and TB-1800:**
- Designed to minimize interference with multiple robot systems.

### Collision Detection and Flex-Servo Control
- **Functionality:**
- Prevents torch misalignment due to collision.
- The manipulator detects unexpected force (collision) applied to the arm with high sensitivity.

- **Mechanism:**
- When a collision is detected, the manipulator quickly switches to flex-servo mode, releasing the force and preventing damage to the torch.

- **Advantages:**
- Quick recovery allows for more efficient production.
- The manipulator can be easily moved away from the collision scene.

### Summary
The TA/TB series offers advanced features for digital interfacing with Panasonic's welding machines, ensuring high-quality welding results through innovative design and technology. The integration of collision detection and flex-servo control enhances operational efficiency and safety, making it an ideal choice for modern welding applications.

# Standard Specifications of Manipulators

| Model         | TA-1000 | TA-1400 | TA-1600 | TA-1800 | TA-1900 | TB-1400 | TB-1800 |
|---------------|---------|---------|---------|---------|---------|---------|---------|
| Type          | Short arm | Standard arm | Middle arm | Long arm | Torch cable integrated |  |  |
| Structure     | Independent articulated |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Degree of Freedom | 6 kg | 4 kg |  |  |  |  |  |
| Maximum Payload | 8 kg |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Maximum Accessible Distance | 1068 mm | 1374 mm | 1598 mm | 1796 mm | 1895 mm | 1437 mm | 1802 mm |
| Minimum Accessible Distance | 362 mm | 352 mm | 360 mm | 472 mm | 551 mm | 376 mm | 480 mm |
| Maximum Speed |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Arm Rotation (RT) | 2.97 rad/s (170°) | 2.97 rad/s (170°) |  |  |  |  |  |
| Upper Arm (UA) | 3.32 rad/s (190°) | 2.97 rad/s (170°) |  |  |  |  |  |
| Front Arm (FA) | 3.32 rad/s (190°) | 3.05 rad/s (175°) |  |  |  |  |  |
| Wrist Rotating (RW) | 6.46 rad/s (370°) | 6.28 rad/s (360°) | 5.93 rad/s (340°) |  |  |  |  |
| Bending (BW) | 6.54 rad/s (375°) | 6.11 rad/s (350°) | 6.54 rad/s (375°) |  |  |  |  |
| Twisting (TW) | 10.5 rad/s (600°) | 9.42 rad/s (540°) | 10.5 rad/s (600°) |  |  |  |  |
| Positioning Repetition Precision | ±0.1 mm or less | ±0.15 mm or less | ±0.1 mm or less |  |  |  |  |
| Brake | All axes are provided with brakes |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Installation Position | Floor/Ceiling (factory option) |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Weight of Manipulator | About 145 kg | About 161 kg | About 203 kg | About 204 kg | About 171 kg | About 214 kg |  |

This document provides a comprehensive overview of the dimensions and specifications of various manipulator types, including short, standard, middle, and long arm types, along with their respective maximum reach, payload capacity, and operational characteristics.

# Dimensions of Manipulators (mm)

## Torch Cable Integrated Type
- **TB-140O**
- Max Reach: 1437 mm
- **TB-180O**
- Max Reach: 1802 mm

| Dimension | TB-140O | TB-180O |
|-----------|---------|---------|
| 160       | 210     | 820     |
| 160       | 210     | 910     |
| 155       |         |         |

### Specifications (Controller) (mm)
- **Controller Model**: GM
- **Dimensions (mm)**:
- Width (W): 553
- Depth (D): 550
- Height (H): 681
- **Weight (kg)**: 60
- **Memory Capacity**: 40,000 points
- **Position Control Method**: Software servo control
- **External Memory**:
- Teach Pendant SD memory card slot
- USB 2.0 (Hi-speed not supported) - 2 ports

### Teach Pendant
- **Number of Control Axes**: 6 axes simultaneously, Max. 27 axes
- **Input and Output**:
- Input: 40 points (Option: expandable to 2048 points)
- Output: 40 points (Option: expandable to 2048 points)
- **Input Power Source**: 3-phase, 200-220 VAC, 3 kVA, 50/60 Hz
- **Notes**:
- X1: Protruding portions not included
- X2: Excluding the Teach Pendant and connecting cable

## Dimensions of the Wrist Flange (mm)

### TA Series
- **Common between all TA types**:
- 04H7 Depth: 10
- PCD: 2402

| Dimension | Depth | PCD |
|-----------|-------|-----|
| 4M5      | 8     |     |
| 4M6      | 12    |     |
| 4(MAX)   |       |     |

### TB Series
- **Common between all TB types**:
- 04H7 Depth: 5

| Dimension | Depth | PCD |
|-----------|-------|-----|
| 4M5      | 10    |     |
| 35       |       |     |
| 90'      |       |     |

### View from A
- **Diagram Description**: The view from A illustrates the layout and dimensions of the wrist flange for both TA and TB series manipulators, highlighting the common specifications and variations in depth and PCD.
